cit:description.gco:CharacterString: Thumbnail of Gnihton Inc mining licence locations

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Location of all of current mineral Exploration Licences issued under the Mining Act, 1971 to Gnihton Inc. Gnihton Inc has exclusive tenure rights to explore for mineral resources for up to a maximum of 5 years at these locations. Gnihton has undertaken environmental and heritage assessments of these locations to meet the conditions of the ELs. This data does not include the locations where minerals are extracted.

mri:purpose.gco:CharacterString: Data released to show Gnihton shareholders the extent of the company's mineral exploration interests

mri:credit.gco:CharacterString: The Company would like to acknowledge to assistance of Gnihton Yletulosba Inc for their guidance and advice

mco:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Any use of the resource must be accompanied by the following attribution: Gnihton Inc provided the mineral exploration locations and wishes to acknowledge the traditional cusodians of the lands and waters on which Gnihton Inc has undertaken exploration

mdq:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: Number of items within the dataset that should not have been in the dataset

mdq:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: Compare count of items in the dataset against count of items in universe of discourse.

mdq:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: indication that an item is incorrectly present in the data

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Data product specification. Maximum of two items can be missing from each feature type.
Data product specification. Maximum of two items can be missing from each feature type.
Data Quality Report ISO 19157-1 Annex D/D4.1.2/Table D.12

mdq:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The quality evaluation report attached to this quality evauation is providing more details on the derivation and aggregation method.

mdq:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: 100percent pass fail aggregation of the conformance commission result for roads and paths

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Data product specification. Maximum of two items can be missing from each feature type.

mdq:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: Derivation from quantitative results reported in qyuality evaluation report.

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Data product specification. Maximum of two feature instances can be misclassified as another of the building feature types and zero as other feature types.

mdq:explanation.gco:CharacterString: The original quantitative result is provided in ... of the quality evaluation report

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Data product specification. Maximum of two feature instances can be misclassified as another of the building feature types and zero as other feature types.

mdq:explanation.gco:CharacterString: The original quantitative result is provided in the quality evaluation report

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Data Quality Report ISO 19157-1 Annex D/D4.1.2/Table D.13

mdq:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The quality evaluation report attached to this quality evauation is providing all the quantitative results which are not provided in the metadata, and more details on the derivation and aggregation method.

mdq:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: 100percent pass fail aggregation of the conformance classification correctness result for inductrial buildings and houses

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Data product specification. Maximum of two items can be miss-classified.

mdq:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: Indication that all requirements in the referrence data product specification are fulfilled.

mdq:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: 100percent pass fail aggregate of each conformance result for the requirement expressed in the data product specification.

mdq:explanation.gco:CharacterString: 3 requirements out of 11 are not fulfilled: the dataset is not conformant

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Data Quality Report ISO 19157-1 Annex D/D4.1.2/Table D.14. Reporting as quality evaluation report

mdq:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The quality evaluation report attached to this quality evauation is providing fully-detailed information about the evaluation applied and results obtained.

mdq:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: Comparison of absolute positional accuracy using known positional accuracy of the two or more independent objects

mdq:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: Compares absolute possitional accuracy of the archaeological object and the absolute positional accuracy of the river.

mdq:deductiveSource.gco:CharacterString: Positional accuracy of the rivers nearby the archaeological camp.

mdq:statement.gco:CharacterString: Relative positional accuracy between the archaeological objects and rivers is higher than the absolute positional accuracy of the archaeological objects (5m)

mdq:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: Standard deviation where the true value is not estimated from the observations but known a prioriStandard deviation where the true value is not estimated from the observations but known a priori
The ratio between the accuracy class of the evaluation elements and the accuracy class that has to be obtained in the dataset.

mdq:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: The bigger the "Safety Factor" is the more trustful is the evaluation. The "Safety Factor" has to be bigger than 2 to validate the evaluation.
